35 static ptlist_t ptimer_running_list;
36 timestamp_t ptimer_next_stop = 0;
37 bool ptimer_pending = false;
38 
39 
40 #if MYOSCONF_STATS
41 size_t ptimer_list_size;
42 #endif
43 
44 const process_event_t ptimer_poll_evt = {
45  .to = &ptimer_process,
46  .id = PROCESS_EVENT_POLL,
47  .data = NULL
48 };
49 
50 
51 static void ptimer_next_stop_update(ptimer_t *ptimer)
52 {
53  timestamp_t this_stop = timer_timestamp_stop(&ptimer->timer);
54 
55  if( ptimer_pending )
56  {
57  if( timestamp_less_than(this_stop,ptimer_next_stop) )
58  {
59  ptimer_next_stop = this_stop;
60  }
61  }
62  else
63  {
64  ptimer_next_stop = this_stop;
65  ptimer_pending = true;
66  }
67 }
68 
69 void ptimer_add_to_list(ptimer_t *ptimer)
70 {
71  if ( !ptimer->running )
72  {
73  ptlist_push_front(&ptimer_running_list,ptimer);
74 
75 #if MYOSCONF_STATS
76  if(++ptimer_list_size > myos_stats.ptlist_size_max)
77  {
78  myos_stats.ptlist_size_max = ptimer_list_size;
79  }
80 #endif
81  }
82 
83  ptimer->running = true;
84  ptimer_next_stop_update(ptimer);
85 }
86 
87 void ptimer_remove_from_list(ptimer_t *ptimer)
88 {
89  if( ptimer->running )
90  {
91  ptimer->running = false;
92  ptlist_erase(&ptimer_running_list,ptimer);
93 
94 #if MYOSCONF_STATS
95  ptimer_list_size--;
96 #endif
97  }
98 
99 
100 }
101 
102 
103 PROCESS(ptimer_process,ptimer_process);
104 PROCESS_THREAD(ptimer_process)
105 {
106  PROCESS_BEGIN();
107 
108  ptlist_init(&ptimer_running_list);
109 
110  while(1)
111  {
112  PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT(PROCESS_EVENT_POLL);
113  ptimer_pending = false;
114 
115  ptimer_t *curr = (ptimer_t*)ptlist_begin(&ptimer_running_list);
116 
117  while(curr != (ptimer_t*)ptlist_end(&ptimer_running_list))
118  {
119  ptimer_t *next = (ptimer_t*)ptlist_next(&ptimer_running_list,curr);
120 
121  if( ptimer_expired(curr) )
122  {
123  /* remove ptimer from list */
124  ptlist_erase(&ptimer_running_list,curr);
125  curr->running = false;
126 #if MYOSCONF_STATS
127  ptimer_list_size--;
128 #endif
129 
130  if( curr->handler )
131  {
132  curr->handler((void*)(curr));
133  }
134  }
135  else
136  {
137  ptimer_next_stop_update(curr);
138  }
139 
140  curr = next;
141  }
142  }
143 
144  PROCESS_END();
145 }
146 
147 PROCESS(ptimer_process,ptimer_process);
148 PROCESS_THREAD(ptimer_process)
149 {
150  PROCESS_BEGIN();
151 
152  ptlist_init(&ptimer_running_list);
153 
154  while(1)
155  {
156  PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT(PROCESS_EVENT_POLL);
157  ptimer_pending = false;
158 
159  ptimer_t *curr;
160 
161  ptlist_foreach(&ptimer_running_list,curr)
162  {
163  if( ptimer_expired(curr) )
164  {
165 
166 #if MYOSCONF_STATS
167  ptimer_list_size--;
168 #endif
169 
170  if( curr->handler )
171  {
172  curr->handler((void*)(curr));
173  }
174 
175  ptimer_remove_from_list(curr)
176 
177 
178  /* remove ptimer from list */
179  ptlist_erase(&ptimer_running_list,curr);
180  curr->running = false;
181 
182 
183 
184 
185  }
186  else
187  {
188  ptimer_next_stop_update(curr);
189  }
190  }
191  }
192 
193  PROCESS_END();
194 }

198 void ptimer_start(ptimer_t* ptimer, timespan_t span, ptimer_handler_t handler)
199 {
200  ptimer->handler = handler;
201  timer_start(&ptimer->timer,span);
202  ptimer_add_to_list(ptimer);
203 }
204 
205 void ptimer_restart(ptimer_t* ptimer)
206 {
207  timer_restart(&ptimer->timer);
208  ptimer_add_to_list(ptimer);
209 }
210 
211 
212 void ptimer_reset(ptimer_t* ptimer)
213 {
214  timer_reset(&ptimer->timer);
215  ptimer_add_to_list(ptimer);
216 }

220 extern bool process_deliver_event(process_event_t *evt);
221 
222 
223 void ptimer_processing(void)
224 {
225 
226 #if MYOSCONF_STATS
227  rtimer_timestamp_t start;
228  rtimer_timespan_t slicetime;
229 #endif
230 
231  if ( ptimer_pending && timestamp_passed(ptimer_next_stop) )
232  {
233  ptimer_pending = false;
234 
235 #if MYOSCONF_STATS
236  start = rtimer_now();
237 #endif
238 
239  process_deliver_event((process_event_t*)&ptimer_poll_evt);
240 
241 #if MYOSCONF_STATS
242  slicetime = (rtimer_timespan_t)RTIMER_TIMESTAMP_DIFF(rtimer_now(),start);
243 
244  if( ptimer_process.maxslicetime < slicetime )
245  {
246  ptimer_process.maxslicetime = slicetime;
247  }
248 #endif
249  }
250 }
